channel.title: Pages on Joe Garrett
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Joe Garrett

item.title: Projects
item.description: In my time, I have worked on a few different projects, mostly related to imaging and measurement. Current projects: HYPSO the hyperspectral imaging cubesat Efficient Learning and Optimization Tools for Hyperspectral Imaging Systems (ELO-Hyp) SeaBee:Infrastructure for Drone-based Research, Mapping and Monitoring in the Coastal Zone Older projects: ADRASSO looking for rust Casimir force measurements Kelvin probe microscopy of solar cells Measurements of radiation pressure, towards the design of solar sails
